snippet.title: A Dance of Fire and Ice: Neo Cosmos DLC Teaser
snippet.description:
UPDATE: OUT NOW! Enjoy! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1977570/A_Dance_of_Fire_and_Ice__Neo_Cosmos/#app_reviews_hash


Happy 3 years of ADOFAI! We've released a new update to mark the occasion with a jumbo set of new things (see details at https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/977950/view/3118180956284291012) (on desktop for now, and mobile coming soon)

But what's this?! Neo Cosmos is our very first paid DLC expansion to A Dance of Fire and Ice. It includes a whole new set of levels, and """more""". It's created and directed by TaroNuke @taro4012, creator of NotITG (https://notitg.heysora.net/) and UKSRT. This means that you're in for a fun ride. Coming in a quarter of a year, oh wow that's quite soon now..

Thanks for playing our game!
--
📹 Trailer by Not El Donte (notRat has me on his list again#4404)
🎵 Music by Ash Astral
🎨 Additional Storyboarding by Găvănescu Matei (AdipemDragon)
🛑 One reference to 'Third Wave Flip-Flop but whoever made this level was drunk' by Firestix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YJ2EDGj09hw

Play ADOFAI!
ADOFAI On Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/977950/A_Dance_of_Fire_and_Ice/
ADOFAI on iOS:
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/a-dance-of-fire-and-ice/id1456547302
ADOFAI on Android:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.fizzd.connectedworlds&hl=en&gl=US
